Blurring Offensive.name: Blurring Offensive
Blurring Offensive.flavor: You move with such speed and attack with such force that your enemy finds it impossible to track your movements.
Blurring Offensive.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Blurring Offensive.effect: Before the attack, you shift 1 square. If you are marked, that condition ends on you before the shift.
Blurring Offensive.onHit: 2[W] + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn. In addition, you slide the target 1 square, and you shift 1 square.

Striding Barrage.name: Striding Barrage
Striding Barrage.flavor: You speed across the battlefield, loosing shot after shot as you move.
Striding Barrage.requirement: You must be wielding a light thrown or a heavy thrown weapon to make a melee attack with this power.
Striding Barrage.effect: You shift 2 squares and make a secondary attack.
Striding Barrage.onHit: 1[W] + 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the primary target is slowed (save ends).
Striding Barrage.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Striding Barrage.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the tertiary target is slowed (save ends).
Striding Barrage.secondaryeffect: You shift 2 squares and make a tertiary attack
Striding Barrage.tertiaryTarget: One creature other than the primary and secondary targets

Swift Vengeance.name: Swift Vengeance
Swift Vengeance.flavor: After being hit, you adjust your position to prepare your revenge.
Swift Vengeance.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack
Swift Vengeance.effect: You shift 1 square. Until the end of your next turn, the triggering enemy grants combat advantage to you, and you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19â€“20 against that enemy when you make weapon attacks against it.
